Text

[Ana Huang]138-stacey is a USA Today , Publishers Weekly , Globe and Mail and [No.1 Amazon bestselling author]355-no.1 amazon bestselling author . [She]138-stacey writes New Adult and contemporary romance with deliciously alpha heroes , [strong heroines and plenty of steam , angst and swoon sprinkled in]356-strong heroines and plenty of steam , angst and swoon sprinkled in .

[A self - professed travel enthusiast]357-a self - professed travel enthusiast , [she]138-stacey loves incorporating beautiful destinations into [her]138-stacey stories and will never say no to a good chai latte . When sheâ€ ™ s not reading or writing , [Ana]138-stacey is busy daydreaming , binge - watching Netflix , and scouring Yelp for [[her]138-stacey next favourite restaurant]358-her next favourite restaurant .

[She]364-she ’s [the wife [he]366-he never wanted]365-the wife he never wanted … and the weakness [he]366-he never saw coming .

[Ruthless . Meticulous . Arrogant]145-ruthless . meticulous . arrogant .

[Dante Russo]258-dante thrives on control , both personally and professionally .

[The billionaire CEO]367-the billionaire ceo never planned to marry — until the threat of blackmail forces [him]366-he into an engagement with [a woman [he]366-he barely knows]368-a woman he barely knows .

[Vivian Lau]258-dante , [jewelry heiress and daughter of [[his]366-he newest enemy]370-his newest enemy]369-jewelry heiress and daughter of his newest enemy .

It does n’t matter how beautiful or charming [she]258-dante is . [He]366-he 'll do everything in [his]366-he power to destroy the evidence and [their]371-their betrothal .

There ’s only one problem : now that [he]366-he has [her]258-dante ... [he]366-he ca n't bring [himself]366-he to let [her]258-dante go .

* * *

[Elegant . Ambitious . Well - mannered]146-elegant . ambitious . well - mannered .

[Vivian Lau]258-dante is [the perfect daughter]372-the perfect daughter and [[her]258-dante family]373-her family ’s ticket into [the highest echelons of [high society]375-high society]374-the highest echelons of high society .

Marrying [a blue - blooded Russo]376-a blue - blooded russo means opening doors that would otherwise remain closed to [[her]258-dante new - money family]377-her new - money family .

While [the rude , elusive Dante]378-the rude , elusive dante is n't [her]258-dante idea of [a dream partner]379-a dream partner , [she]258-dante agrees to [their]371-their arranged marriage out of duty .

Craving [his]366-he touch was never part of the plan .

Neither was the worst thing [she]258-dante could possibly do : fall in love with [[her]258-dante future husband]380-her future husband .

Content Notes

This story contains explicit sexual content , profanity , mild violence , and topics that may be sensitive to [some readers]381-some readers .

For a detailed list , please visit anahuang.com/king-of-wrath-cws .

CHAPTER 1

[Vivian]258-dante

“ [I]258-dante ca n’t believe [he]366-he ’s [here]2900-here . [He]366-he never comes to these things unless it ’s hosted by [a friend]2901-a friend … ”[258-dante] “ Did [you]258-dante see [he]366-he bumped [Arno Reinhart]147-arno reinhart down a spot on the Forbes Billionaires list ? [Poor Arnie]148-poor arnie nearly had a meltdown in the middle of [Jean - Georges]8-jean - georges when [he]366-he found out … ”[258-dante] The whispers started halfway through the [Frederick Wildlife Trust]9-frederick wildlife trust ’s annual fundraiser for endangered animals . This year , the small , sand - colored piping plover was the alleged star of the show , but [none of the gala ’s [two hundred guests]383-two hundred guests]382-none of the gala ’s two hundred guests were discussing the bird ’s welfare over [their]383-two hundred guests Veuve Clicquot and [caviar cannoli]384-caviar cannoli . “ [I]383-two hundred guests heard [[[his]366-he family]2902-his family ’s villa in [Lake Como]10-lake como]2903-his family ’s villa in lake como is undergoing a one - hundred - million dollar renovation . [The place]2904-the place is centuries old , so [I]383-two hundred guests suppose it ’s time … ”[383-two hundred guests] Each whisper grew in intensity , accompanied by furtive glances and the occasional dreamy sigh . [I]0-i did n’t turn to see who had [the normally cool - as - ice members of [Manhattan high society]386-manhattan high society]385-the normally cool - as - ice members of manhattan high society in such a tizzy . [I]0-i did n’t really care . [I]0-i was too focused on [a certain department store heiress]387-a certain department store heiress as [she]387-a certain department store heiress tottered toward the swag table in sky - high heels . [She]387-a certain department store heiress quickly glanced around before swiping one of the personalized gift bags and dropping it in [her]387-a certain department store heiress purse . The minute [she]387-a certain department store heiress walked off , [I]0-i spoke into [my]0-i earpiece . “ [Shannon]149-shannon , Code Pink at the swag table . Find out whose bag [she]387-a certain department store heiress took and replace it . ”[0-i] Tonight ’s bags each contained over eight thousand dollars ’ worth of swag , but it was easier to fold the cost into the event budget than confront [[the Denman]150-the denman ’s heiress]388-the denman ’s heiress . [[My]0-i assistant]389-my assistant groaned over the line . “ [Tilly Denman]150-the denman again ? Does n’t [she]387-a certain department store heiress have enough money to buy everything on that table and have millions left over ? ”[389-my assistant] “ Yes , but it ’s not about the money for [her]387-a certain department store heiress . It ’s the adrenaline rush , ”[0-i] [I]0-i said . “ Go . [I]0-i ’ll order bread pudding from [Magnolia Bakery]11-magnolia bakery tomorrow to make up for the strenuous task of replacing the gift bag . And for [God]151-god ’s sake , find out where [Penelope]152-penelope is . [She]152-penelope ’s supposed to be manning [the gift station]2905-the gift station . ”[0-i] “ Ha ha , ”[149-shannon] [Shannon]149-shannon said , obviously picking up on [my]0-i sarcasm . “ Fine . [I]149-shannon ’ll check on the gift bags and [Penelope]152-penelope , but [I]149-shannon expect a big tub of bread pudding tomorrow . ”[149-shannon] [I]0-i laughed and shook [my]0-i head as the line cut off . While [she]149-shannon took care of the gift bag situation , [I]0-i circled [the room]390-the room and kept an eye out for other fires , large or small . When [I]0-i first went into business , it felt weird working events [I]0-i would otherwise be invited to as [a guest]391-a guest . But [I]0-i ’d gotten used to it over the years , and the income allowed [me]0-i a small degree of independence from [[my]0-i parents]392-my parents . It was n’t part of [my]0-i trust fund , nor was it [my]0-i inheritance . It was money [I]0-i ’d earned , fair and square , as [a luxury event planner in [Manhattan]12-manhattan]393-a luxury event planner in manhattan . [I]0-i loved the challenge of creating beautiful events from scratch , and [wealthy people]394-wealthy people loved beautiful things . It was a win - win . [I]0-i was double - checking the sound setup for the keynote speech later that night when [Shannon]149-shannon rushed toward [me]0-i . “ [Vivian]258-dante ! [You]258-dante did n’t tell [me]149-shannon [he]2906-he was here ! ”[149-shannon] [she]149-shannon hissed . “ Who ? ”[149-shannon] “ [Dante Russo]258-dante . ”[149-shannon] All thoughts of swag bags and sound checks flew out of [my]0-i head . [People]2907-people will be talking about this for weeks . ”[149-shannon] The earlier whispers suddenly made sense . [Dante Russo]258-dante , [the enigmatic CEO of the luxury goods conglomerate the Russo Group]395-the enigmatic ceo of the luxury goods conglomerate the russo group , rarely attended public events that were n’t hosted by [himself]258-dante , [one of [[his]395-the enigmatic ceo of the luxury goods conglomerate the russo group close friends]397-his close friends , or one of [[his]395-the enigmatic ceo of the luxury goods conglomerate the russo group important business associates]398-his important business associates]396-one of his close friends , or one of his important business associates . [We]2913-we ’re here to work , not ogle [the guests]402-the guests . ”[0-i] [I]0-i gently pushed [her]149-shannon toward the dessert table . “ Can [you]149-shannon bring out more Viennese tartlets ? [We]2913-we ’re running low . ”[0-i] “ Buzzkill , ”[149-shannon] [she]149-shannon grumbled , but [she]149-shannon did as [I]0-i said . [I]0-i tried to refocus on the sound setup , but [I]0-i could n’t resist scanning [the room]390-the room for [the surprise guest of the night]404-the surprise guest of the night . It was so thick [I]0-i could n’t see beyond the outer edges , but [I]0-i ’d bet [my]0-i entire bank account [Dante]258-dante was the center of [their]406-the crowd by the entrance attention . [My]0-i suspicions were confirmed when [the crowd]407-the crowd shifted briefly to reveal a glimpse of dark hair and broad shoulders . A rush of awareness ran the length of [my]0-i spine . [Dante]258-dante and [I]0-i belonged to tangential social circles , but [we]408-we ’d never officially met . From what [I]0-i ’d heard of [his]409-his reputation , [I]0-i was happy keeping it that way . Still , [his]409-his presence was magnetic , and [I]0-i felt the pull of it all the way across [the room]390-the room . An insistent buzz against [my]0-i hip washed away the tingles coating [my]0-i skin and drew [my]0-i attention away from [[Dante]258-dante ’s fan club]411-dante ’s fan club . [My]0-i stomach sank when [I]0-i fished [my]0-i personal cell out of [my]0-i purse and saw who was calling . [I]0-i should n’t take personal calls in the middle of a work event , but [one]412-one simply did n’t ignore a summons from [Francis Lau]154-francis . [I]0-i double - checked to make sure there were no emergencies requiring [my]0-i immediate attention before [I]0-i slipped into [the nearest restroom]413-the nearest restroom . “ Hello , [Father]155-father . ”[0-i] The formal greeting rolled off [my]0-i tongue easily after almost twenty years of practice . [I]0-i used to call [him]154-francis [Dad]156-dad , but after [Lau Jewels]157-lau jewels took off and [we]414-we moved out of [[our]414-we cramped two - bedroom]415-our cramped two - bedroom into [a Beacon Hill mansion]416-a beacon hill mansion , [he]154-francis insisted on being called [Father]155-father instead . Apparently , it sounded more “ sophisticated ”[154-francis] and “ upper class . ”[154-francis] “ Where are [you]0-i ? ”[154-francis] [His]154-francis deep voice rumbled over the line . “ Why is it so echoey ? ”[154-francis] “ [I]0-i ’m at work . CHAPTER 9

[Vivian]258-dante

[The flea market]1003-the flea market was alive with the sounds of haggling and the faint honks of cabs from [the neighboring streets]1004-the neighboring streets . The scent of churros swirled through the air , and everywhere [I]0-i looked , [I]0-i saw an explosion of different colors , textures , and fabrics . [I]0-i ’d been visiting [the same market]1005-the same market every Saturday for years . It was a treasure trove of inspiration and one - of - a - kind items [I]0-i could n’t find in [the carefully curated luxury stores]1006-the carefully curated luxury stores , and it never failed to pull [me]0-i out of a creative rut . It was also [my]0-i favorite place to visit when [I]0-i needed to clear [my]0-i head . Today , however , [it]1007-it did neither of those things . No matter how hard [I]0-i tried , [I]0-i could n’t shake the memory of [Dante]258-dante ’s mouth on [mine]0-i . The firmness of [his]1008-his lips . The heat of [his]1008-his body . The subtle , expensive scent of [his]1008-his cologne and the self - assured weight of [his]1008-his hands on [my]0-i hips . Days later , [I]0-i could still feel the vividness of the moment as clearly as if it ’d just happened . It was infuriating . Almost as infuriating as how [I]0-i ’d opened up to [him]1008-his over breakfast , only for [him]1008-his to revert to asshole status after a brief , shocking display of humanity . Contrary to what [I]0-i ’d told [him]1008-his at the photoshoot , there was something unsettling about coming [home]504-home every day to [a silent , spotless house]1010-a silent , spotless house . [We]1011-we ’ve been [here]2900-here already , ”[178-isabella] [she]178-isabella repeated . “ [You]178-isabella bought the pashmina ? ”[178-isabella] [I]0-i blinked as the rest of [the stall]1013-the stall ’s contents came into sharp focus . [She]178-isabella was right . CHAPTER 35

CHAPTER 36

Vivian

CHAPTER 38
